speaker.whotheyare: Qiuqing Tai helps companies discover the best ways to responsibly unlock the power of information and technology.
speaker.whylisten: Qiuqing Tai is a strategy senior director at KE.com, a leading Chinese internet company, where she is helping with the company's digital transformation. Previously, she was a principal in BCG's Shanghai office, serving as a core member of the company’s technology, media and telecom practice. In her work, Tai explores the evolution of the media industry and its impact on economic development, advises traditional media on how to transform in the digital age and helps internet companies unlock the power of technology responsibly. She holds a PhD in political science from Yale, where she researched how exposure to different media can shape political perceptions of migrants. She has also prepared speeches for the former president of the World Bank, James Wolfensohn, on economic development topics.
